Features

Bad Luck+: -1 Benny each session
Combat
Parry: 6 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 6 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: Medium Native Shield Weapons: Bayonet (d8+d4); Brass Knuckles (d8+d4); Unarmed
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Improved Fan The Hammer: Increased Fan The Hammer effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Don't Get'im Riled!: Adds wound level to damage rolls
Duelist: Gets two extra hole cards at start of duel
Fan The Hammer: May shoot up to 6 shots in one action at -2; 1 or 2 may hit bystander
Quick Draw: Spending a benny gives two extra Action Cards
